name: Give up the Dupe (itch)
description:
Give Up The Dupe is a short 10-15 minute sokoban-style puzzle game where you cannot see or being seen by yourself.

Features
  • Clone yourself as many times as you want.
  • Undo button. No puzzle wastes your time because you accidentally pressed the wrong key.

Powered By Ebiten, A dead simple 2D game library in Go.
